precondition: The user is on the Windows XP desktop. The Start Menu is visible.
expected_results: The Start Menu should open, displaying a list of programs and options.

action: Hovers the mouse cursor over the 'Control Panel' option.
expected_results: The system should display a tooltip describing the 'Control Panel' option.

precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Control Panel' option.
expected_results: The Control Panel window should open.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Category View'.
action: Hovers the mouse cursor over the 'Date, Time, Language, and Regional Options' category.
expected_results: The system should display a tooltip describing the 'Date, Time, Language, and Regional Options' category.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Category View'.
action: Clicks the 'Switch to Classic View' link.
expected_results: The Control Panel should switch to 'Classic View', displaying all control panel icons.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.
action: Hovers the mouse cursor over the 'Add or Remove Programs' icon.
expected_results: The system should display a tooltip describing the 'Add or Remove Programs' function.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.
action: Hovers the mouse cursor over the 'Power Options' icon.
expected_results: The system should display a tooltip describing the 'Power Options' function.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window should open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is set to 'After 20 mins'.
action: Clicks the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu should expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Selects 'Never' from the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu should now display 'Never'.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is set to 'Never'.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window should close, and the changes should be applied.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.
action: Hovers the mouse cursor over the 'Display' icon.
expected_results: The system should display a tooltip describing the 'Display' function.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.

expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab should become active, displaying screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open on the 'Screen Saver' tab. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is set to 'Windows XP'.
expected_results: The dropdown menu should expand, displaying a list of screen saver options.

precondition: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Selects 'None' from the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu should now display 'None'.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open on the 'Screen Saver' tab. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is set to 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window should close, and the changes should be applied.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open in 'Classic View'.
action: Clicks the close button ('X') of the Control Panel window.
expected_results: The Control Panel window should close.
